title: Fix non-responsive Cancel and Delete buttons in Personal Center

requirements.text: Fix the Cancel Quest button (取消任务) in PersonalCenter to trigger the CancelQuestDialog when clicked. Ensure the button properly opens the dialog and handles the cancellation flow.

quotes: 我点击取消任务或者删除没有任何反应

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Cancel Quest button opens the CancelQuestDialog
Dialog displays quest details and refund amount
User can confirm or cancel the operation
Success/error feedback is shown after action

requirements.text: Fix the Delete button (删除) in PersonalCenter to trigger the DeleteQuestDialog when clicked. Ensure the button properly opens the dialog and handles the deletion flow.

quotes: 我点击取消任务或者删除没有任何反应

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Delete button opens the DeleteQuestDialog
Dialog displays confirmation warning with quest title
User can confirm or cancel the deletion
Success/error feedback is shown after action

requirements.text: Add visual feedback (loading states, disabled states, or click animations) to both Cancel and Delete buttons during processing to improve user experience and prevent double-clicks.
acceptanceCriteria: Buttons show loading state during mutation processing
Buttons are disabled during processing to prevent duplicate submissions
Clear visual indication when action is in progress

constraints: Do not modify the CancelQuestDialog or DeleteQuestDialog components themselves
Maintain existing quest state management logic
Preserve all existing styling and layout
nonGoals: Changing the dialog designs or content
Modifying backend quest cancellation or deletion logic
